channel.title: QOwnNotes on Dave Evans
channel.description: Recent content in QOwnNotes on Dave Evans

item.title: Using QOwnNotes with NextCloud
item.description: The next part of this migration is something that is a LONG time coming, replacing Evernote. However, this isn’t quite a migration. I had stopped using Evernote a few years ago, when I had switched my daily driver to Linux. Most of my data that was previously in Evernote, I had exported to folders in my Dropbox, but while I kept it, I didn’t really use it anymore. Most of my note taking has reverted to just text files that reside spread across my Documents directory, and I have no good way of organizing them.
